["I'm full of puns, but light on humor.", 'Time flies like an arrow; fruit flies up a drain.', "You can lead a horse to water, but you can't make it drink punny!", 'A watched pot never boils—until your mom asks if dinner is ready.', 'An apple a day keeps the doctor away..', 'I was reading a book on anti-gravity, and then I floated away.', "That's a bunch of new words for no reason.", 'I told my wife she should embrace her mistakes', "I'm reading a book about anti-gravity", 'A picture is worth a thousand puns..', "Life's too short for bad coffee and worse jokes.", "You can't spell 'pun' without 'u'.", 'I was going to buy some flowers, but then I saw the puns...', 'An unexamined life is not worth living—unless it has no examination of humor!', 'I just wanted to book a flight; ended up with a bookmark in my side.', "It's time for bed, but first, let me give you some 'sleepy' puns.", "If you don't believe in gravity, try standing on one leg while laughing off the absurdity of life..", 'I was feeling kind of low until someone told me that depression is just a state of mind—a very gloomy one at that.', 'Too many cooks spoil the broth; but too many comedians ruin the pun line-up.', 'A man walks into a bar..']
